extensionDescription.message: A ntfy browser extension to receive notifications without having the page open

optionsEmpty.message: Press the button below to add a topic subscription
optionsEmpty.description: Message when there are no topic configured yet.

optionsTopicLabel.description: Label shown above input field for Topic.

optionsHostnameLabel.description: Label shown above input field for Hostname.

optionsTokenLabel.description: Label shown above input field for Token.

optionsTokenHint.message: Leave empty when authorization is not required
optionsTokenHint.description: Hint shown below input field for token.

optionsRemoveTopic.description: Button label to remove a topic.

optionsAddTopic.description: Button label to add a topic.

optionsSnackbarSaveFailure.description: Shown after failing to save options

errorBoundaryTitle.description: Title when an unexpected error occurs

errorBoundaryDescription.message: This should obviously not happen. Very sorry about this.
errorBoundaryDescription.description: Description when an unexpected error occurs

errorBoundaryDescriptionGithub.message: If you have a minute please open an issue on Github.
errorBoundaryDescriptionGithub.description: Link text to point the user to opening an Github issue

errorBoundaryStackTraceTitle.description: Title above the stack trace when an unexpected error occurs

erroBoundaryStackTraceCopy.description: Button label to copy the stack trace when an unexpected error occurs
